Summary: Response to Minnesota watchers and blinkers
divs: Sighting DetailsYou are not alone.I've been researching the UFO phenomena for 51 years and have extensive information on what you describe as watchers and blinkers.I refer to the larger craft as transport or motherships and the smaller craft as orbs or scout craft. Both are visible to the trained, unaided eye. The transport craft are similar to our aircraft carriers in the respect that they both discharge smaller craft and, later, provide a landing site. I've identified 8 transport craft that discharge hundreds of scout vehicles nightly. Watching this is both awesome and frightening, knowing the vast numbers but unaware of their intentions. I have an enormous amount of information that I will share with you and others on this site. Thank you for submitting information about the watchers and blinkers.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Lansdale
There were no other sightings in Lansdale on or around March 22nd 2011
